TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ValidationSummary extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 在网页、消息框或在这两者中内联显示所有验证错误的摘要。

span.span: Displays a summary of all validation errors inline on a Web page, in a message box, or both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于将网页上所有验证程序的错误消息汇总到一个位置。The class is used to summarize the error messages from all validators on a Web page in a single location. 通过 设置属性将控件分配到验证组，可以在网页上汇总一组验证器中的错误消息 。You can summarize the error messages from a group of validators on a Web page by assigning the control to a validation group by setting the property. 摘要可以显示为列表、项目符号列表或基于属性的单个段落 。The summary can be displayed as a list, as a bulleted list, or as a single paragraph, based on the property. 通过 分别设置和属性，可以在网页和消息框中显示摘要 。The summary can be displayed on the Web page and in a message box by setting the and properties, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 在 控件内使用控件时 ，请确保验证程序控件及其关联的控件位于同一面板中。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关将 控件用于部分页面更新的详细信息，请参阅 [部分页呈现概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100))。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100)). 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) 和 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件对网页上所有验证控件中的错误消息进行汇总，并在项目符号列表中显示这些错误消息。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to summarize the error messages from all validation controls on a Web page and display them in a bulleted list. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ValidationSummary Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ValidationSummary Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ValidationSummary Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ValidationSummary Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置验证摘要的显示模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display mode of the validation summary.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可指定控件的显示格式 。Use this property to specify the display format of a control. 摘要可以显示为列表、项目符号列表或单个段落。The summary can be displayed as a list, as a bulleted list, or as a single paragraph. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性设置 为显示项目符号列表。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to display a bulleted list. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ValidationSummary.DisplayMode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ValidationSummary.DisplayMode Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ValidationSummary.DisplayMode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ValidationSummary.DisplayMode Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 该显示模式不是 值之一。

span.span: The display mode is not one of the values.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 控件是否使用客户端脚本更新自身。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control updates itself using client-side script.

value.span: 如果 控件使用客户端脚本更新自身，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control updates itself using client-side script; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可指定控件是否 使用客户端脚本更新自身。Use this property to specify whether the control updates itself using client-side script. 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则在客户端上呈现客户端脚本以更新 控件（如果浏览器支持该功能）。When this property is set to `true`, client-side script is rendered on the client to update the control, if the browser supports that feature. 如果将此属性设置为 `false` ，则不会在客户端上呈现客户端脚本，并且该 控件仅在到服务器的往返行程时更新自身。When this property is set to `false`, no client-side script is rendered on the client and the control only updates itself on round trips to the server. 在这种情况下， 属性不起作用。In this situation, the property has no effect. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来防止 控件使用客户端脚本更新自身。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent the control from using client-side script to update itself. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ValidationSummary.EnableClientScript Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ValidationSummary.EnableClientScript Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ValidationSummary.EnableClientScript Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ValidationSummary.EnableClientScript Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以显示控件的标题 。Use this property to display a title for the control. 该 属性不是 HTML 编码的。The property is not HTML encoded. 因此，可以将 HTML 标记包含在中 。Therefore, HTML tags can be included in . 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来显示控件的标题 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a title for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ValidationSummary.DisplayMode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ValidationSummary.DisplayMode Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ValidationSummary.DisplayMode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ValidationSummary.DisplayMode Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在调用基控件的 方法之后， 如果满足以下条件，则将属性设置为：After this method calls the base control's method, it sets the property to if the following conditions are true: - 尚未设置属性。The property is not already set. - 属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4。The property indicates an ASP.NET version earlier than 4. 默认情况下，在 ASP.NET 4 和更高版本中，验证程序控件不会以红色显示错误消息。By default, in ASP.NET 4 and later versions, validator controls do not display error messages in red. 有关如何控制验证程序控件的视觉外观的信息，请参阅 [在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100))。For information about how to control the visual appearance of validator controls, see [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以便它始终在自定义服务器控件中将错误消息显示为粗体 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always displays error messages as bold in a custom server control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidationSummaryOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidationSummaryOnPreRender/CS/custom_validationsummary_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidationSummaryOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidationSummaryOnPreRender/VB/custom_validationsummary_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomValidationSummaryOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidationSummaryOnPreRender/CS/custom_validationsummary_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomValidationSummaryOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidationSummaryOnPreRender/VB/custom_validationsummary_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以使 控件环绕 标记。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the control is surrounded by a tag. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidationSummaryRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidationSummaryRender/CS/custom_validationsummary_rendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidationSummaryRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidationSummaryRender/VB/custom_validationsummary_rendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomValidationSummaryRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidationSummaryRender/CS/custom_validationsummary_render.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomValidationSummaryRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidationSummaryRender/VB/custom_validationsummary_render.vb#2)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the validation summary is displayed in a message box.

value.span: 如果在消息框中显示验证摘要，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the validation summary is to be displayed in a message box; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了属性外，还可以使用此属性 来控制验证摘要的显示位置。This property can be used in addition to the property to control where the validation summary is displayed. 如果此属性和均 设置为 `true` ，则验证摘要将显示在消息框中。If this property and are both set to `true`, the validation summary is displayed in a message box. 如果 设置为 `false` ，则此属性不起作用。If is set to `false`, this property has no effect. > [!NOTE] > 如果 和 属性都设置为 `true` ，则验证摘要将显示在消息框和网页上。If both the and properties are set to `true`, the validation summary is displayed in both a message box and on the Web page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 属性来指定仅在消息框中显示验证摘要。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to specify that the validation summary is displayed only in a message box. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了属性外，还可以使用此属性 来控制验证摘要的显示位置。This property can be used in addition to the property to control where the validation summary is displayed. 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则验证摘要将显示在网页上。If this property is set to `true`, the validation summary is displayed on the Web page. > [!NOTE] > 如果 和 属性都设置为 `true` ，则验证摘要将显示在消息框和网页上。If both the and properties are set to `true`, the validation summary is displayed in both a message box and on the Web page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 属性来指定在消息框和网页上都显示验证摘要。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to specify that the validation summary is displayed in both a message box and on the Web page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `true` ，则 `disabled` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `false` ，则 `class` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象为其显示验证消息的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the object displays validation messages.

value.span: 对象为其显示验证消息的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the object displays validation messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用 属性可指定 控件将对错误消息进行汇总的验证组的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control will summarize error messages. 当你为属性指定值时 ，只会汇总来自作为指定组一部分的验证控件的错误消息。When you specify a value for the property, only error messages from the validation controls that are part of the specified group are summarized. 如果未设置此属性的值，则将汇总未分配给验证组的页面上的验证控件的所有错误消息。If you do not set a value for this property, all error messages from validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are summarized. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).
